Five-year CDS on Anheuser-Busch InBev have widened out 25% over the past month  to price at the widest levels observed in three years. After pricing  consistently in line with 'A/A-' levels

A full  list of rating actions is shown at the end of this commentary. The rating action reflects likely higher leverage for both A
